data.title: Reconnect With Old Friends Message Board
data.meta_description: Republic Of The Gambia, Banjul, Africa, The Very, Very, West Of Africa, Investments, Banjul, The Gambia, Serekunda, Serrekunda, Bakau, Brikama, Wolof, Mandinka, Fula, Serreh, Creol, Aku,Hotels, Africa, West Africa, WABA, Luigi, Luigis, Givino, Solomons, Solomon, Solomon's, Waaw, Palma Rima,Gambia, Gambia Goverment, Gambia Police, Gambian History, Slave Trade, Gambian Currency, Gambian Geography, Gambian Restaurants, Dolphin Bar, River Gambia,
data.text:
Messages Posted from September 1997 - June 1998

Below is what other people have added:

Returned Peace Corps Volunteers Other returned volunteers (e.g. VSO, CUSO, IFISH) Gambians living abroad Others

Returned Peace Corps Volunteers

Name: Amy Suleski

Other name(s): Binta Silla

Email: a52771@hotmail.com

Dates lived in Gambia: 1993-1995

Location/assignment: I lived in Fulla Kunda/Jakkaba south of Kuntaur on the North Bank...

Message: Nimbarra everyone! I thought I would sign on since everyone else seems to be doing it! Columbus, Ohio can be a boring place, but I am trying my damnnedest to liven' it up. Currently, I am pursuing life as a rock and roll star and writing grants for kicks on the side. If you need a wedding singer or entertainment for any other social functions, I give special discounts to RPCVs.

Friday, May 22, 1998 at 16:25:27 (EDT)

Name: Wendy Kestner

Other name(s): Jarra Dibba!!!!

Email: wendy@net.co.kr

Dates lived in Gambia: '94-'95

Location/assignment: Illiasa with Bill!

Message: Hey everyone! you'll never guess! I am a .... COLLEGE PROFESSOR!

of course not in America, (think they'd have me?!)

I am in S. Korea going on my 22 month.

Surprisingly, I have Gambian friends here! (Surprising that they are in Korea not that they are my friends! )

What is funny is that they are uncomfortable about being stared at (by Koreans) all the time. And they insist Gambia is not like that! I tried to explain the impact the word TOUBAB! had on my life, but to no avail.

It is so great Andy has this site. It is the lazy girls way of keeping in touch. And I welcome anyone to e-mail me!

On the love front, (i always have one, don't I?) I am engaged to a Korean, but we are having VISA difficulties. If love will endure... only time will tell. I don't know if I can spend my whole life here!

I hope to hear news about you all, soon!

Love Jarra Dibba!

Friday, May 15, 1998 at 00:37:31 (EDT)

Name: Gene Monette

Other name(s): Seiku Samara

Email: eugenem@gardeners.com

Dates lived in Gambia: 95-97

Location/assignment: Kiang, Kolior/ agroforestry

Message: Hello people. Cheri & I are living in Burlington VT for at least another year and welcome visitors even if we even remotely know you (this includes Heath). America is weird. What's with the baggy pants? Can't wait to hear from y'all.

Saturday, May 09, 1998 at 15:29:11 (EDT)

2. Dumbutu -- field naturalist assigned to Kiang West National Park

Name: mickie dent

Other name(s): arokee gibba

Email: mdent@harveststates.com

Dates lived in Gambia: 1990-1992

Location/assignment: afsi/horticulture in kanuma, near somita and sibanor

Message: i'm living in st. paul, mn. i hope to reconnect with some old friends. i married eric and we have a beautiful little 1 year old boy(Sawyer). Visitors are always welcome in our home.

Thursday, April 23, 1998 at 15:05:20 (EDT)

Name: Lainie Thomas

Other name(s): Nyakingyamba Sanyang

Email: lainie@eudoramail.com

Dates lived in Gambia: 1992-94

Location/assignment: I taught English, Math and Science at Kerewan Middle School in Baddibu, NBD.

Message: Hi everyone! Glad to see that there is a place to leave messages for old friends. Some of us Baddibunkers are trying to organize a reunion this June. We'd love to see all volunteers (even south bankers!) from everywhere, from all organizations (we have some APSO and VSO interest so far, too), and from all years. Drop me a line if you want more details. It's less than $250 round trip from London- less than you thought? Plus, aren't your last pair of samaotos wearing a bit thin lately? Time to have them remelted together! Hope to see LOADS of people!

Tuesday, March 10, 1998 at 10:35:15 (EST)

Name: John Gustafson

Other name(s): Monee Dampha

Dates lived in Gambia: 1989-1991

Location/assignment: Taught ESL and mathematics and served as the librarian at Pakalinding Secondary Technical School in Mansa Konko

Wednesday, March 04, 1998 at 14:21:54 (EST)

Name: Bob Kirk

Other name(s): Bob Joof

Email: Robert_Kirk@hotmail.com

Dates lived in Gambia: '89-'91

Location/assignment: Kaur Secondary Technical School on the North Bank

Message: For my birthday I had my friends give me school supplies to send to Kaur rather than presents. It saves on the clutter.

I'm moving to Ecuador in June, '98.

Wednesday, March 04, 1998 at 13:14:38 (EST)

Message: Greetings everyone. I am currently in St. Louis, Missouri. If you're ever in the neighborhood...let me know...I'll put the kettle on.

Tuesday, February 10, 1998 at 18:34:31 (EST)

Other name(s): Grumpy

CHIEF CHEF, Babou's Bar and Grill

Message: Yes, it is true, I am still unfortunately stuck with computers and making a living in the Bay Area, California

Thursday, January 22, 1998 at 19:24:05 (EST)

Name: Hans Deutsch

Other name(s): Haunsee Deutech

Email: Detroit442@juno.com

Dates lived in Gambia: July '94 through '96

Message: Yes, it's true. Heath, Hans, and friends have been hard on it playing cards. In fact, they find time to do little else. The action has been fast and furious (Pitch, Gin Rummy, Hearts), and many a snort and giggle has been had by all involved. In case you're wondering, pictures of all that has been will soon be posted on Heath's Web-Page. Our Broncos Rule! (Colorado, Colorado, Colorado)

Wednesday, January 14, 1998 at 19:27:05 (EST)

Name: Heath Stewart

Other name(s): Faring Touray

Email: heath_stewart@hotmail.com

Dates lived in Gambia: 95-97

Location/assignment: Lamin - St. Peter's Technical High School - Math/Science and Head of Computer Department - Honorary degree as assistant bush pig chef at Babou's

Message: Oh the horror...of living in the same city as Hans and still being caught in the betting cycle. I was last seen running around Wash Park in my Gambia clothes.

Monday, January 05, 1998 at 01:13:49 (EST)

Name: Bill Retherford

Other name(s): Musa Jammeh, Musa Duttoe, Bill 2-Buckets

Email: wjr4564@hbu.edu

Dates lived in Gambia: 7/93 - 8/95

Location/assignment: Assigned to the very cooperative region od Badibu and lived in Illiasa

Message: Just wanted to say hello to everyone. Miss being a volunteer. Working in Houston, TX for an intermodal company and attempting to get my MBA. I do miss the JulBrew.

Thursday, December 18, 1997 at 13:52:16 (EST)

Name: Julie Mueller

Other name(s): Shady, Tenenfing

Email: jdmueller@vax1.bemidji.msus.edu

Dates lived in Gambia: July 1993-October 1995

Location/assignment: Sutukonding, URD

Message: For some reason I feel compelled to get into medical school, so that I can go live in a really hot place again and be a doctor. To complete the fantasy, I want to get my pilots liscence and fly all over Africa bringing good cheer and medical supplies to everyone. Maybe I should stop taking mephaloquine.

Saturday, December 06, 1997 at 17:14:00 (EST)

Name: Jen Hardt

Other name(s): Jarra Sanneh

Email: kmcevoy@earthlink.net

Dates lived in Gambia: 1992-1994

Location/assignment: Forester in the village of No Kunda on the North Bank, Baddibu district.

Message: Greetings to everyone! Living in Omaha. Would like to hear from RPCVs.

Saturday, October 25, 1997 at 18:12:20 (EDT)

Name: Paul Cichello

Other name(s): Ebrima Dibba

Email: plc11@cornell.edu

Dates lived in Gambia: 1992-94

Location/assignment: Kaur/ Middle School Teacher

Message: SWM seeking erotic adventure, ohhh, wrong website.

Actually, I'm engaged and just starting a five year Economics program at Cornell. The e-mail address should allow anyone who's interested to contact me.

Friday, October 17, 1997 at 17:21:42 (EDT)

Name: Leslie Di Nal

Other name(s): Fatoumatta Ceesay

Email: ldinal@inetowrld.net

Dates lived in Gambia: 1994-1996

Location/assignment: I lived on the north bank of the river near Georgetown in the village of Jarumeh Koto.

Message: I hope all fellow RPCVs are doing well. I spent some quality time with Tamra and Scott this September in the northern California wine country. Hope to visit again soon. Check out my webpage at: http://www.inetworld.net/ldinal/Leslie1.html Not working

Friday, October 17, 1997 at 01:13:47 (EDT)

Name: Hans Deutsch

Other name(s): Baakari Jawneh

Email: Detroit442@juno.com

Dates lived in Gambia: July of '94 through July '96

Location/assignment: Worked as a elementary teacher/trainer in Nyakoi-Kerewan (across the river from Basse Santa Su).

Message: Greetings! I'd love to hear from anyone except Larry Dixon and Jason Messick. Go Broncos!

Monday, October 13, 1997 at 18:50:43 (EDT)

Name: Pauline Lohr

Other name(s): Fatoumata San Yang

Email: plohr@gene.com

Dates lived in Gambia: July1993-95

Location/assignment: Sankuleykunda--MID Natural Resources Volunteer

Message: Just wanted to post this to let folks know I am on line and missing my RPCV friends terribly. Drop me a line if you have a chance. Had a kick butt rock n roll jam fiesta reunion at my parent's farm this past summer for all those 93-96 volunteers. Had a blast and drank a lot.

Monday, October 13, 1997 at 06:23:18 (EDT)

Name: Richard Smiley

Email: Richard.A.Smiley@ccmail.census.gov

Dates lived in Gambia: July 1992 - July 1994

Location/assignment: Education Volunter -- I taught Maths and Stats at Armitage High School, Georgetown, Maccarthy Island Division (now Central River Division); I also worked with The National Population Division on preparation of the "Population Databank" publication.

Message: I'm currently working at the Bureau of the Census on improving questionnaire wording and design. If I haven't heard from you in a while, drop me a note and say hi!

My current address (as of September of 1997) is:

1635 N. Oak Street, Apt #1

Arlington, VA 22209-2715

phone: (703) 524-2007

Friday, September 19, 1997 at 11:42:51 (EDT)

Name: Andy Lyons

Other name(s): Filijee Daffeh

Email: alyons@nervm.nerdc.ufl.edu

Dates lived in Gambia: 1991-1995

Location/assignment: I taught at Nusrat High School in Bundung and worked at the Book Production Unit in Kanifing.

Message: I'm now a graduate student at the University of Florida in Gainesville. I hope to return to Africa in the summer of 1998 to do my masters thesis research in Zambia. I maintain this web page as a hobby. Greetings to all my former Peace Corps friends, colleagues at Nusrat and BPMRU, and former students. Kori tanante!

Thursday, September 18, 1997 at 20:40:54 (EDT)

Other Returned Volunteers

Name: Herv√© Grosdoit-Artur

Other name(s): Bubba Touray (my gambian name)

Email: herve_ga@club-internet.fr

Dates lived in Gambia: 01-95 to 10-96

Location/assignment: Kanifing

Message: I was a VSO volunteer working at the YMCA training centre to set up computer courses. I miss Gambia ! If any of my friends, colleagues or students read this, please email me !

Read you all soon ! Herve

Sunday, May 17, 1998 at 05:51:51 (EDT)

Name: Paul Fervoy

Other name(s): Modou Barro

Email: paul@acceso.or.cr

Dates lived in Gambia: Summer 1989

Location/assignment: Barro Kunda, NBD.

Message: Coming up on the tenth anniversary of my Crossroad's summer in The Gambia. I catch myself lost in those memories from time to time, like today. So I went searching the Net and found this and other sites. I found that our group leader John Mitchell is still writing for the L.A. Times. I wonder what others are up to, especially Matarr Bah who emigrated to the US in 1991 and was last heard from living in North Carolina. Anyone?

Sunday, May 03, 1998 at 19:46:30 (EDT)

Gambians Living Abroad

Name: BABOUCARR DABO

Other name(s): ABUBACAR DABO

Email: ABUBACAR@MCMAIL.COM

Dates lived in Gambia: BORN&BRED

Location/assignment: BANJUL

Message: WOULD LOVE TO HEAR FROM GAMBIANS LEAVING ANY WHERE ON THIS EARTH.AM FROM BANJUL,GRANT STREET TO BE PRECISE.AM CURRENTLY LEAVING IN ENGLAND.STUDYING COMPUTER PROGRAMMING IN C++.CAN ANYONE PLEASE GIVE ME IMFORMATION ABOUT THE WHEREABOUT OF BINTOU N{truncated}

Also If anybody has any information on Momodou Jawara(ex president's son) please E-mail me. He used to be my best friend back when we were Teenagers

Message: I am presently living in Stockholm Swden with my wife Pia Jallow and two sons Ibrima and Yusuf Jallow. I have been living here since 1986. Working as a computer cordinator at the Labour Union in Stockholm. I am furthering my education in cumputer science. This i do parallely to my job.

I am born citizen of Basse. Attended school at LKJ.

Mail me any time you wants.

Lets keep in touch through CyberSpace.

Message: I am married and live with my wife in Minneapolis MN. I am currently a junior at the Carlson School of Management at the University of MN.

Boris
